question: In which of the following years the Swaraj Party was founded by Motilal Nehru?
explanation: In 1923 Motilal helped found the Swaraj Party , the policy of which was to win election to the Central Legislative Assembly and obstruct its proceedings from within. In 1928 he wrote the Congress Party\'s Nehru Report, a future constitution for independent India based on the granting of dominion status.
